body_html:
Thanks for the bump! It doesn't seem like @saeta has much buy-in. For now I'm focused on working around this in my own projects by building proxies, libraries, and other components that make it easier to move quickly. Happy to contribute to any efforts by the community though!
…
On Mon, Aug 20, 2018, 11:38 Edd Wilder-James ***@***.***> wrote: If this work is moving forward, @ajbouh <https://github.com/ajbouh>, sounds like it might make a good TensorFlow RFC, with @saeta <https://github.com/saeta> as the sponsor. For more, see https://github.com/tensorflow/community/blob/master/governance/TF-RFCs.md — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. For now I'm focused on working around this in my own projects by building

quickly.

Happy to contribute to any efforts by the community though!

body:
Thanks for the bump! It doesn't seem like @saeta has much buy-in.

For now I'm focused on working around this in my own projects by building
proxies, libraries, and other components that make it easier to move
quickly.

Happy to contribute to any efforts by the community though!

On Mon, Aug 20, 2018, 11:38 Edd Wilder-James <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> If this work is moving forward, @ajbouh <https://github.com/ajbouh>,
> sounds like it might make a good TensorFlow RFC, with @saeta
